short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a search to find HTML content, like class names etc. within the current domain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find code with this extension

This extension is a powerful tool for web developers and testers that lets you instantly search the ENTIRE HTML source code of a website, including all linked pages within the same domain.

Simply input your search term in the Extension Settings page, activate the extension on any webpage, and let the extension do the heavy lifting. It will compile a list of all matching links, saving you valuable time and effort.
